chart_description: This chart displays the latency of hardware Interrupt Requests (IRQs) handled by the system. It can help diagnose latency issues related to the hardware interrupt handling process.

dimension_descriptions.ata_piix: This dimension refers to the latency of IRQs coming from the ata_piix driver, which is used for various PATA/SATA controllers.
dimension_descriptions.local_timer: This dimension refers to the latency of IRQs generated by the local timer, which is used for scheduling tasks in the CPU.
dimension_descriptions.virtio0: This dimension refers to the latency of IRQs originating from the virtio0 driver, which provides a para-virtualization interface for virtual machines.
